column1: Uchi////Great restaurant! Have been coming here for special occasions for the past 4 years. My husband and I sat at the sushi bar and Tri (in training) was our chef which did a terrific job in choosing dishes that best suited our palate! He introduced dishes that allowed us to explore new flavors
column2: textures and profiles of food. Sohan was wonderful as well in attending to us as he also surprised us with a variety of drinks which we would have never thought of ordering. Thank you for one all your help and guidance Kaleb in helping steer out courses. Hope to back soon!
